wikipedia_page.main: Michael Dunbar (30 October 1863 – 6 September 1921) was a Scottish footballer. He played for Cartvale, Cowlairs, Hibernian and Celtic as an inside right. After being forced to retire from playing football due to injury, Dunbar became a director of Celtic.
